transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji madam, kaise hain aap?
Customer: I am fine.
Executive: Haan ji Prashant baat kar raha hu main IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji madam bataiye services mein abhi bhi koi issues to aa rahe hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Wo issues aa rahe hai leads jo aa rahi hai wo hamare business ke related nahi aa rahi hai aur jo do lead business ke related aati hai wo at a time expire ho jati hai.
Customer: Wo hi problem hai because nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Jo leads aa rahi hai jo hum consume karne jaate hai wo hamare business ke related hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Business related leads nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Nahi wo nahi aa rahi hai aur jo aa rahi hai sample base mein bhi agar hum consume karne ja rahe hai to bhi expire hoti hai.
Executive: Aapne over India ke liye hi aapne liya hai na platform ko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To all over India se to requirement aa rahi hai.
Customer: Par ye hame business hi nahi mil raha hai main wahi bol rahi hu kyuki business hame mil hi nahi raha hai aapki aur se leads aapki taraf se jo notification mein aati hai wo hum consume karne jaate hai lagta hai ki ha ye hamare liye beneficial hai usko hum consume karne jaate hai to wo expire ho jati hai aur jo leads hum dusri hai jo ka matlab rehti hai expire nahi hoti hai to wo hamare business se related hai hi nahi wo artificial tree wali hai dekhiye aap check kijiye wo gemstone ke related nahi hai.
Executive: Gemstone tree nahi hai?
Customer: Haan stone ke related hai hi nahi hai.
Customer: Wo aap khud check kar lijiye andar account open karke aap dekhiye usme se.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul main check karunga.
Customer: Haan usme se dekhiye kitni matlab hum log consume kar paaye hai aap khud check kijiye at a time hum log consume karne jaate hai to jo hamare business se related hai to at a time expire ho jati hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Wo expire ho rahi hai at a time consume karne ja rahe hai to wo expire ho rahi hai main wahi bata rahi hu ki jo hamare related aati hai wo hum consume karne jaate hai to wo expire ho jati hai fir uske alawa jo leads aati hai usko dekhte hai hum aur jo rehti hai matlab expire nahi ho rahi to wo hamare business se related hi nahi hai wo artificial tree wali hai morning ki jo hai wo artificial tree ki hai dekhiye wo plastic tree ki usme uski hai.
Customer: Aap check kar lijiye aaj morning ki hi hai aur abhi bhi jo aur abhi ki jo aayi wo hum consume karne gaye to expire ho gayi just abhi half an hour before aayi wo bhi hum consume karne gaye at a time to wo expire ho gayi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Within a micro second karne ja rahe hai to bhi aisa ho raha hai.
Customer: Ab kya karu main mujhe nahi karna hai ek kaam kijiye main ab main mera bhi patience khatam ho raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai to ab hamara plan jo hai wo cancel kar dijiye.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Main aapko baat karta hu baat kijiye.
Customer: Haan aur hamara subscription cancel kar dijiye aur hamara money back hota hai wo hame money back dijiye.
Executive: Aap apne payment wagera ko leke ek baar baat kar lijiye main aapko detail de dunga.
Executive: Baki main ye keh raha tha ki follow up wagera jaise dusre product hai uski requirement generate ho rahi hai na?
Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Prashant baat kar raha hu sir main IndiaMART se senior manager. Haan haan boliye mujhe pata hai aap Prashant ji baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To ye aap log tiger eye gemstone bracelet mein bhi deal karte hai na?
Executive: To rate wagera mein.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Just now mein ye ho jata hai expire bata deta hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Wahi matlab.
Executive: Theek hai main ek baar baat karta hu.
Executive: Kya hua sir?
Executive: Yahi problem rehti hai.
Executive: Main yahi problem hai na main samajh raha hu bas. Ye problem aa rahi hai kyuki high sold category hai aapke sare products aur thoda sa competition jyada hone ki vajah se jaise requirement generate ho rahi hai wo consume bhi ho ja rahi hai. Main ek baar dekhta hu backend team se baat karke hai aur fir dekhte hai sir kya karte hai theek hai. Main update karta hu aapko backend team se baat karke.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not related to the business.

- Leads expire at the time of consumption.

- Wants subscription to be cancelled.

- Wants money back.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check with backend team.

- Executive offered to connect with payment team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update after backend team discussion.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, cancellation
